Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Golden sunlight softens the edges of time, while the endless chorus of insects fills the air. Wrapped in the haze of late summer, it all drifts away into a dreamy whisper.'}
{3: 'You had arranged to meet her in Constellia, but with a city this big, where exactly would you find her?'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5401_08.jpg'}
{3: 'Following the voice, you look up. She is smiling down at you from above, just as distant as when you first met.'}
{3: 'So far away she seems like she could melt into the sky itself, and you cannot help wondering if she might float away with the clouds at any moment.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Heave-ho!'}
{3: 'The dazzling light from the horizon rushes toward you, carrying the warm scent of sun-soaked air.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Chosen One?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "My, my, someone's been enchanted by Jetavie.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She waves a hand in front of your face, smiling with her eyes.'}
{2: 'You really do love high places.', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Mmm-hmm! It makes it easier to catch you off guard.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "And it's perfect for this thing called a camera. Helps me get better shots.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'A Golden Age antique I borrowed from the souvenir shop. Supposedly for filmmaking. With it, I can finally make a movie.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With some hesitation, you take the long, black metal cylinder from her hands. She circles around to your side and proudly presses play.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1036.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1036.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'On the small screen, most of the actors look awkward. The little mechanoids bob their heads, their voices too faint to make out clearly.'}
{3: 'The film itself is not all that exciting... incomplete, slow pace, nothing special. You would normally be ready to stop watching.'}
{1: 'Somehow, your eyes stay glued to it.', 3: '45'}
{3: 'Somehow, your eyes stay glued to it.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1034.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1034.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: "It's set in Constellia, a place you know inside out, yet the way it's captured feels unfamiliar."}
{3: 'The sky is perfectly clear, no haze, no clouds. Light from the towering sky dome pours down in a vivid, dreamlike wash.'}
{3: 'People, objects, scenery—everything is right there, yet it feels strangely far away.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}
{3: 'Before you are ready, the scene freezes. Then it shifts, old things vanish, new things take their place...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Before you even notice, the film has ended. She takes the camera back, looking pleased.'}
{2: 'That is very you.', 3: '83', 4: 'It was good. I would watch more.', 5: '83'}
{2: 'But... when did you get into filmmaking?', 3: '84'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Just something for the Double Seventh. It's rare I get to sneak out of Babylonia with you, especially during Kowloong's Double Seventh Festival.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "They say it's the day when the Cowherd and Weaver Girl reunite, only once a year. If a moment is that rare, would you not want to remember every second of it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "So I'm going to record today perfectly, as a film.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'But you noticed, did you not? The movie is missing a main character.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You want to film me?', 3: '92', 4: 'You want me to be your lead?', 5: '92'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Exactly. So... you in?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Jetavie's expression suddenly changes, a little unsettling, as she leans in without warning. Her hands slide up to rest lightly on your neck."}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'My dear Chosen One, have I ever told you there are places I want to take you that go far beyond Constellia...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Snowy peaks, volcanoes, high skies, deep seas... Some might be a bit dangerous for humans. But I'll keep you safe, though the journey might get a little thrilling.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "If you say yes now, maybe I'll decide to stay here in Constellia instead, and spend a quiet, peaceful Double Seventh with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'So? Have you made up your mind? I need your answer—YES or YES?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course. My pleasure, Director.', 3: '108', 4: 'YES, YES, YES!', 5: '108'}
{3: 'She wraps her arms around your neck in one swift motion, pressing her face close to yours.'}
{3: 'The sunlight warms your skin, her breath flowing through the narrow space between you.'}
{3: 'After holding you for a moment, she takes in your scent with a soft inhale, then steps back.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Alright, back to business.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gives you a wink, then lifts a camera so large it looks almost ridiculous against her slim frame.'}
{3: "The moment she switches into filming mode, the playful smile fades from Jetavie's face. She focuses entirely on trying different angles."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1034.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}
{3: 'Why is Jetavie so intent on recording every moment of the Double Seventh Festival? Scenes from her earlier footage play through your mind.'}
{3: 'She pours all her effort into capturing moments that can never be repeated.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Her images are always filled with breathtaking beauty, but also touched by the quiet melancholy of things that will eventually fade.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab'}
{1: '1005', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront39.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1217.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1217.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab', 2: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiColorTableStageMain/FxUiColorTableStageRollStarLoop.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Everything here, no matter how stable it may appear on the surface... is actually a fragile existence.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiColorTableStageMain/FxUiColorTableStageRollStarLoop.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory914.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1218.jpg'}
{3: "Collapsing matrices, endless cycles—the memories that shaped her past haven't dulled her passion for life, but they have made her determined to hold on to every beautiful sight."}
{1: '1005', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront39.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}
{3: 'Today, the Double Seventh Festival, is no different.'}
{3: "Through the oversized camera, she tries to capture everything around her, her free hand holding tightly onto <phonetic=her Chosen One's>yours</phonetic>..."}
{3: 'And suddenly, you understand.'}
{2: 'Jetavie, set the camera down for a moment.', 3: '179'}
{3: 'She looks up, puzzled, still busy with her work.'}
{2: "I shouldn't be the only one in the frame. You should be in it too. This is our moment.", 3: '183'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "What are you thinking, Chosen One? Without me behind the camera, the film won't be perfect!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "This day is special—it brought you to me. That's why, today, I must...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not just today.', 3: '187'}
{2: "Today, tomorrow, and every day after, I'll be with you.", 3: '188'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'But what exists today might be gone tomorrow... I have to hold on to this moment.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You don't have to cling to just one moment.", 3: '191'}
{2: 'This is our film.'}
{2: 'And the best scenes are still ahead, waiting for us to make them together...', 3: '195'}
{3: 'Before you finish speaking, she throws her arms around you, pulling you into a soft embrace.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Alright, alright, you're rambling... How long are you planning to keep going?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "I want a future that lasts a long, long time, so you'd better keep that big promise!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, I promise.', 3: '204'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "You don't get a choice in the matter anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'So, my dear Chosen One, what do you want to film with me?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1020.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Antique Shop Owner', 3: "I still don't get it. What could you possibly do with a camera that was already outdated back in the Golden Age?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'A camera can capture scenery, or a person, even their heart. But... looks like I miscalculated.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: '"This is our film"—that\'s what that fool told me.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'A teasing yet gentle smile curves across her lips.'}
{2: 'Antique Shop Owner', 3: 'Still not getting it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "I don't need to fear loss anymore. Instead, I'll embrace the future with <phonetic=The Chosen One>that person</phonetic>.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "It's okay. You're too young. You'll get it once you're a little more awake to the world.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'She gives the little mechanoid shopkeeper a light pat on the head, sets the borrowed camera back on the counter, and strolls away humming a tune.'}
